fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Entrapment (Infinite): Target a player during the day. The next night, you will jailkeep them, roleblocking them and allowing you to speak with them privately without revealing your identity. You will appear as a Jailor to a jailed target. Jailed targets will have Invincible Defense. They are not immune to being visited.
~ Interrogation (2-shot): Learn your jailkept target’s exact role.
~ Frameup (1-shot): Learn a secret of your jailkept target, framing them as a role of your choice for the rest of the game.
~ Torture (1-shot): Learn your jailkept target’s exact role, blackmail them, and prevent their vote for the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ This role has priority to spawn if any Jailor or similar roles are present.
~ The jailkept target will know if they were tortured, but not if any other ability was used on them.
~ You may use multiple abilities on your jailed target.
